title: Merlin's magical message
creator_credit: Rick Reinert and American Dental Association
brief_description: Uses animation to emphasise he importance of home dental care in preserving good dental health. Using animation and Merlins and King Arthur as characters, pints out the importance of home dental care, especially brushing.
